description._content: Catalog #: 09_01864 Title: Brigadier General Clarence S. ""Bill"" Irvine Special Collection Photo Additional Information: Clarence S. Irvine with an Indian man and a cow. Handwritten inscription ""When on a hike in the hills I met this ?? Tribesman and his ?? - the beasts of burden of the poorer classes used for ploughinh and all types of field work - and hauling - using heavy two wheeled wagons with solid wooden wheels."", Brigadier General Clarence Irvine enjoyed a long distinguished military career, mainly involving engineering. He served with the XXI Bomber Command (B-29's) during WWII and continued to serve throughout the 1950s and 1960s. Tags: Brigadier General Clarence S. ""Bill"" Irvine Special Collection Photo,Â 1952 Repository: San Diego Air and Space Museum Archive
